titleStmt.title: A briefe relation of the idiotismes and absurdities of Miles Corbet, Esquire, councellor at law, reorder [sic] and burgesse for Great Yarmouth by Antho. Roily ...
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

notesStmt.note: Antho. Roily is pseudonym of John Taylor (1580-1653). Cf. LCNA.
Imperfect: print show-through with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
